page.title: 12 RAMSDEN SLAUGTER HOUSE
page.content: The slaugter house has only four employees, induding the owner. The business has been in the family for many years,the present owner only recently taking over from his father who has retired. The four men start work at 7.00 and continue until 5.00 from Monday to Friday. Sometimes they even have to work on a Saturday morning, despite only being able to get about twenty animals a week. They use a captive bolt pistol to kill the cows and an electric gun to kill pigs,sheep and goats. Not only do they kill the animals but they treat the pork ,beef and other meats before sending it to the butchers. Every day animals are delivered and meat is collected.
